api
Interface InterceptorBinding

All Known Implementing Classes:
InterceptorBindingImpl
public interface InterceptorBinding

Representation of the bindings used by Nanocontainer to link a interceptor method (AroundInvoke annotated method) with its interceptor bean type (Interceptor annotated class) and with the quaifiers of the interception (InterceptorBinding annotations).

Author:
Matthieu Clochard

Method Summary
 java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
          The interceptor method (AroundInvoke annotated method).
 java.util.Set<java.lang.annotation.Annotation> getQualifiers()
          The InterceptorBinding annotations of the interception (including interceptor bean and method annotations).
 BeanType getType()
          The bean type of the interceptor bean declaring the method.
 

Method Detail

getMethod

java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
The interceptor method (AroundInvoke annotated method).

Returns:
the method of this binding.

getType

BeanType getType()
The bean type of the interceptor bean declaring the method.

Returns:
the BeanType of the interceptor bean.

getQualifiers

java.util.Set<java.lang.annotation.Annotation> getQualifiers()
The InterceptorBinding annotations of the interception (including interceptor bean and method annotations).

Returns:
all the InterceptorBinding annotations of the interceptor bean and method as a Set.
